DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Efficacy Multiport Versus Uniport Flexible Catheter Labor Epidural Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: Multiport catheter , compare uniport catheter , associate well analgesic quality labor epidural analgesia presence one port may enhance distribution epidural medication Flexible catheter , compare rigid catheter , associate well analgesic quality labor epidural analgesia great flexibility may minimize catheter deviation epidural space , facilitate optimal catheter placement epidural space , result well distribution epidural medication It unknown whether multiple port , promote good distribution epidural medication , provide add analgesic benefit flexible catheter , also facilitate good distribution epidural medication , use provision epidural analgesia labor delivery
